Module org.softsmithy.lib.core
Package org.softsmithy.lib.io

Class Files

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.softsmithy.lib.io.Files
  • public class Files
extends Object
    A utility class for Files.
    Note: The API may change in a future version!

    Author:
    Florian Brunner
    See Also:
    File

        Gets the extension of a file
        Parameters:

        the extension of the specified file

        Returns:

      • readLines

        public static String[] readLines​(File file)
                          throws FileNotFoundException,
                                 IOException
        Reads the lines from a text file.

        Return type may change to List<String> in future!?
        Parameters:
        file - the text file
        Returns:
        the lines read from a text file
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
        IOException - if an IO error occurs

      • delete

        public static boolean delete​(File file,
                             boolean recursivly)
        Deletes (optionally recursivly) the specified file or directory.
        Parameters:
        file - the file or directory to be deleted
        recursivly - If true, deletes the directory recursivly. If false or if file is not a directory, only the specified file gets deleted.
        Returns:
        true, if all files/ directories could be deleted, else false.

      • getPathNames

        public static String[] getPathNames​(File path)
        Gets the path names of the specified path. If the path is absolute the root is NOT inclueded!

        This will be always true:
        path.equals(Files.getFile(Files.getRoot(path), Files.getPathNames(path))

        Note: return type might change to List<String> with java v1.5
        Parameters:
        path - the path
        Returns:
        the path names. If the path is absolute the root is NOT inclueded!

      • getFile

        public static File getFile​(String... paths)
        Gets a file from path names.
        Parameters:
        paths - the path names
        Returns:
        the file representing the specified path

      • getFile

        public static File getFile​(File parent,
                           String... paths)
        Gets a file from path names.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent path
        paths - the path names
        Returns:
        the file representing the specified path

      • getRoot

        public static File getRoot​(File file)
        Get the root of an absolute file or directory.

        This will be always true:
        path.equals(Files.getFile(Files.getRoot(path), Files.getPathNames(path))

        Parameters:
        file - a file or directory
        Returns:
        the root of the specified file or directory or null if it is not absolute
